title: Of Knots & Vows & Happily Ever Afters
abstract: A short list of things to do before you say 'I do'.
author: Rishani
content:
If you are thinking of tying the knot anytime soon (or later), you would’ve realised that putting together a wedding involves a lot of work. From the things you plan to wear, to the food, to the venue, to the caterers, to the honeymoon; the list is hopelessly endless.
While it is the most magical day in your life, if you are a scatterbrain, or someone who doesn't have the time to do all the things you need to do, you might just miss out a few things on the way.
We thought we’d help out by putting together a few lists of the people you need to talk to, meet, make reservations with etc all in one blog, just to save you from going grey prematurely. If we've missed any, feel free to add them in the comments below.

Last but not least, if you get yourself a wedding planner, every single thing will be undertaken for. Wedding planners make life a whole lot easier by doing for you everything you need to do.
